alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 1:52PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 230 PM MST... At 151 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Tan Valley, or 11 miles north of Coolidge. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Very heavy rain is falling beneath this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Magma, San Tan Mountain Park, San Tan Valley and Blackwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
